etymology.description: a pig-like creature with fur, depicted with the head of a pig (彑) on top and fur and hooves on the bottom
etymology.interpretation: The character visually represents an animal resembling a pig, with an emphasis on its head and fur. This character makes use of shapes that symbolically convey its features, indicative of its usage to denote gathering, akin to livestock or animals being assembled.

examples.chinese: 在古代文献中，㣇字用于描述动物聚集的场景。
examples.pinyin: Zài gǔdài wénxiàn zhōng, huì zì yòng yú miáoshù dòngwù jùjí de chǎngjǐng.
examples.english: In ancient texts, the character 㣇 was used to describe scenes of animals gathering.

examples.chinese: 有人认为㣇代表了一种已灭绝或神话中的动物。
examples.pinyin: Yǒurén rènwéi huì dàibiǎo le yī zhǒng yǐ mièjué huò shénhuà zhōng de dòngwù.
examples.english: Some people believe that 㣇 represented an extinct or mythical animal.
